author: Staff Reporter
text:
Sholavandan MLA M.V. Karuppiah of the All India Anna Dravida Munnetra Kazhagam filed a complaint with Collector and District Election Officer K. Veera Raghava Rao on Wednesday alleging that bogus voters were being added to the electoral roll in his constituency by Dravida Munnetra Kazhagam men.

Speaking to media after meeting the Collector, Mr. Karuppiah, however, said that he did not submit any evidence to the Collector regarding the allegation.

“I do not have any proof. But I have been receiving complaints from the people in my constituency, based on which I have raised the issue,” he said.

He added that the Collector had assured him that he would look into the allegations immediately.
title: AIADMK MLA files complaint
